import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import logo from '../../images/dp_logo_color.svg' import ContactForm from '../ContactForm/ContactForm'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Section from '../Section/Section'; import { Blob } from 'react-blob' import './Home.css'; export default function Home() { const Avatar = ({src, alt}) => const FunnyLinkButton = ({href, ...props}) => const BackgroundBlob = ({style, props}) => return ( <>

Decentralized People is the union of independent developers formed to collaborate on the projects that bring positive changes to the global society.
